ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] New quest in Firiona Vie
ygData.msgSnippet: I think that it drops from a rare named mob in Trakanon s Teeth: Harbringer. Kill froolok forager & hunters and soon some named mobs will start spawning. I
ygData.messageBody:
I think that it drops from a rare named mob in Trakanon's Teeth: Harbringer.

Kill froolok forager & hunters and soon some named mobs will start spawning.
I think thatere are 16 names total? We have seen a bunch but not been lucky
enough to get the mask yet.

Sylly - the spoiler!

----- Original Message -----
From: Kevin L. Crawford <Lyrnia@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, May 16, 2000 11:34 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] New quest in Firiona Vie


> It, like the mask of deception, is bard/rog only.
>
> I have no idea what drops it
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Cyr, Thierry" <thierry.cyr@...>
> To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
> Sent: Tuesday, May 16, 2000 12:20 PM
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] New quest in Firiona Vie
>
>
> > speaking of which, what/where/how hard drops the Iksar illusion mask?
and
> is
> > it like the old guise of deceiver(anyone can use) or the new guise of
> > deception (has to be equipped)?
> >
